Even though the movie is claimed to be an adult erotica but it's actually made for school going kids. The actress Sejal Shah is hard working and has given her 100%. Her work should be appreciated and she should get better opportunities. Problem is with the makers who do not understand that showing nudity and jumping here and there doesn't make a good erotica. They wasted a talent like Sejal Shah. Hope the makers and the OTT platform owner will learn and present better contents in future. They should take criticism positively and not just entertain school going kids by presenting childish contents.
There must be option of zero.wastage of. Data n time

A low budget indie flick, those looking for gratuitous nudity and an intriguing plotline, will be disappointed. It has no shade of cinematography or visual appeal of the original film it attempts to borrow from. The plot itself is cliched and bears no semblence of originality. The editing and visual department looks amateurish at times and a thorough professional was required to handle this theme for a more matured treatment. But in all a very good first attempt despite all constraints.
Sejal Shah is the real usp of this film, an erotic thriller. Never before saw anything of this standard in Indian cinema. Still thinking about the full frontal nudes done by the Queen Sejal.

The film will make a mark in the indian erotica. I hope many film makers will take thia film as inspiration and come with more good concepts. I appreciate the film makers and hope to see more like this in future.

This movie is going to be a trend setter in erotic genre. Direction and the plot was very good and of course its Sejal show all the way. The best thing about this movie is its artistic presentation of nudity. That's how should be shown nudity if story demands. Going nude is not a big deal but carrying it with grace is the most difficult thing and Sejal made it look very easy.....again its a talent. This is a tailor made role for her. It makes me feel sad when I see some stupid make degrading comments in her twitter account. These are professional actors with lot of guts to pick this kind of bold roles and pull it of with ease. They need to be respected for their work just like other actors. Sejal you truly deserve it and hope you will do more roles like this and break the stereotypes. Of course I wish you all the good luck to get into main stream.
The cast is very good, nudity is at its best, shadows and light work shown in the scenes have given much more glory to the beauty of actress..
